CustomField.description: This field displays any value in the Digicel Country field as the region that the country is associated to. So for example; if a users "Digicel Country" field is populated as "Jamaica", this field will display "C&CA Group"
CustomField.formula: Case (Digicel_Country__c, "Anguilla", "C&CA Group", "Antigua and Barbuda", "C&CA Group", "Aruba", "C&CA Group", "Barbados", "C&CA Group", "Barbados", "C&CA GROUP", "Bermuda", "C&CA Group", "Bonaire", "C&CA Group", "Cayman Islands", "C&CA Group", "Curacao", "C&CA Group", "Carrier Sales", "C&CA Group", "Global Sales", "C&CA Group", "Dominica", "C&CA Group", "El Salvador", "C&CA Group", "French Guiana", "C&CA Group", "Grenada", "C&CA Group", "Guadeloupe", "C&CA Group", "Guyana", "C&CA Group", "Haiti", "C&CA Group", "Jamaica", "C&CA Group", "Martinique", "C&CA Group", "Panama", "C&CA Group", "Saint Kitts and Nevis", "C&CA Group", "Saint Lucia", "C&CA Group", "Saint Vincent and the Grenadines", "C&CA Group", "Suriname", "C&CA Group", "Tres Networks", "C&CA Group", "Trinidad and Tobago", "C&CA Group", "Turks and Caicos Islands", "C&CA Group", "BVI", "C&CA Group", "FWI", "C&CA Group", "Global Sales", "C&CA Group", "Regional Sales", "C&CA Group", "Group Business Team", "C&CA Group", "Vendor", "C&CA Group", "Fiji", "Pacific Group", "PNG", "Pacific Group", "Samoa", "Pacific Group", "Vanuatu", "Pacific Group", "Tonga", "Pacific Group", "Nauru", "Pacific Group", "Reunion", "C&CA Group", "Mayotte", "C&CA Group", "Indian Ocean", "C&CA Group", "Diaspora", "C&CA Group", "Digicel International Business", "C&CA Group" ,"")
CustomField.label: Digicel Region
